protective_factors: Explicitly denies intent or plan (I couldn't do that to them)
Willingness to comply with treatment changes and behavioral interventions
Good insight into the passivity of current ideation
risk_factors: Current symptoms of *Recurrent Major Depressive Disorder, Moderate*
Passive death ideation ('Wish to disappear', 'They'd be better off')
Significant functional impairment (Missed 3 days of work)
Recent initiation/adjustment period of antidepressant (*Sertraline* 4 weeks ago)
clinical_actions: Safety plan reviewed and strengthened around family protective factors
